overview:
Jonas Hellgren is Vice President of Operations at JumpTap.

Jonas joined JumpTap from VeriSign, where he was Vice President of Client Services and Operations, overseeing the delivery of highly secure, highly scalable, and highly available Managed Security Services to a blue chip, international customer base. Prior to VeriSign, he was at Guardent, Inc., where he was Vice President of Operations, responsible for building and operating Guardent’s Managed Security Services. Prior to Guardent, Jonas held technical leadership positions at Razorfish, Claremont Technology Group, and Andersen Consulting.
